TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DynamicUpdateInfo extends System.Object
public ref class DynamicUpdateInfo abstract sealed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別支援 Windows Workflow Foundation 的版本控制和動態更新功能。This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation. 如需有關工作流程版本控制、 工作流程識別和動態更新的詳細資訊，請參閱下列主題：For more information about workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics: - [工作流程版本控制Workflow Versioning](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/whats-new-in-wf-in-dotnet.md) 描述 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中引入的工作流程版本控制功能。Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. - [動態更新Dynamic Update](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/dynamic-update.md) 描述如何使用動態更新，為保存的工作流程執行個體更新工作流程定義。Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update. - [使用 WorkflowApplication 識別與版本控制Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/using-workflowidentity-and-versioning.md) 描述如何使用 裝載工作流程並存的多個版本。Describes how to use to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side. - [WorkflowServiceHost 中的並存版本控制Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/side-by-side-versioning-in-workflowservicehost.md) 描述如何在單一端點上裝載工作流程的多個版本。Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint. - [如何：並存裝載工作流程的多個版本How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-host-multiple-versions-of-a-workflow-side-by-side.md) 此步驟[入門教學課程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)示範如何更新工作流程定義，以及裝載工作流程在同時使用舊的和新的定義。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time. - [如何：更新執行中工作流程執行個體的定義How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-update-the-definition-of-a-running-workflow-instance.md) 此步驟[入門教學課程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)示範如何更新持續性工作流程執行個體，以便使用新的工作流程定義。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.
